Remoraid

Type HP Attack Defense Speed Special Attack Special Defense Total
35 65 35 65 65 35 300
#49 0' 2.5"
26.56 lbs. 		Jet Pokémon A Remoraid uses its abdominal muscles to forcefully expel swallowed water, then shoot down flying prey. When evolution approaches, it travels down rivers.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Hustle 7 Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
1 Sniper 3 Powers up moves if they become critical hits when attacking.
18 Color Change 2 The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.
36 Sprinkle Spit 5 The Pokémon makes it rain when it's hit by an attack.
54 Skill Link 8 Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
72 Refraction 7 Boosts the power of Beam-type moves.
90 Sheer Force 9 Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.
100 Moody 10 Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 10 Water Veil 4 The Pokémon is covered with a water veil, which prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
Disc 18 Mimicry 3 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Disc 24 Frostproof 6 The Pokémon resists Ice-type moves and damage from frostbite.
Disc 43 Limber 4 Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
Disc 51 Cecity -3 This Pokémon's poor eyesight makes its moves more likely to miss.
Disc 52 Damp 2 Prevents the use of explosive moves, such as Self-Destruct, by dampening its surroundings.
Disc 54 Storm Drain 7 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Water-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Berserk 6 Boosts its Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to become half or less.
Cloud Nine 6 Eliminates the effects of weather.
Cold-Blooded 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Color Change 2 The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Distillize 8 Normal-type moves become Water-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Heavy Water 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Flooded Terrain.
Hustle 7 Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
Hydration 5 Heals status conditions if it's raining.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Mega Launcher 7 Powers up aura and pulse moves.
Moody 10 Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.
Rattled 4 Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.
Refraction 7 Boosts the power of Beam-type moves.
Run Away 1 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Sheer Force 9 Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.
Skill Link 8 Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Sniper 3 Powers up moves if they become critical hits when attacking.
Sprinkle Spit 5 The Pokémon makes it rain when it's hit by an attack.
Swift Swim 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain.
Torrent 5 Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
